text: Beloit College is a private liberal arts college in Beloit, Wisconsin, United States. It has 1,000 students and 100 teachers. It was founded in 1846. ==Alumni== * James Arness * Clarence Ellis (computer scientist) * Tom Hulce * Zainab al-Khawaja * Lorine Niedecker * Luke Somers ==Other websites== * https://www.beloit.edu/about/ Category:1840s establishments in Wisconsin Territory Category:1846 establishments in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in Wisconsin
title: Beloit College
